WATCH | Spotlight back on Vrede dairy project at Zondo commission

03 October, 03:17 PM

The judicial commission of inquiry into state capture will on Thursday return its focus to the Vrede dairy project with former Free State agriculture head Peter Thabethe back in the stand.

Deputy Chief Justice Raymond Zondo previously asked Thabethe whether being a head of department, with access to millions of rand in taxpayers' money, if he should have made more of an effort to protect that money, and gone beyond government regulation to ensure its safety.

"Why didn't you protect taxpayer money?" Zondo questioned at the time.

Thabethe said he needed time to think about this.

Stream courtesy of SABC Digital News.
description: The judicial commission of inquiry into state capture returns with its focus on the Vrede dairy farm project when former Free State agriculture head Peter Thabethe returns to the stand.
